title: Spotlights: Tony Ayres
brief_description: A Portuguese Macau-born Australian showrunner, screenwriter, director in television and feature film. He is most notable for his films Walking on Water (2002) and The Home Song Stories (2007) as well his work in television.

constellations_primary.name: Tony Ayres
constellations_primary.description: Charts the acclaimed career of Tony Ayres through his work in film and TV.

description: A Portuguese Macau-born Australian showrunner, screenwriter, film and TV director, Tony Ayres is most notable for his films Walking on Water (2002) and The Home Song Stories (2007), as well his work in TV, including working as the showrunner on The Slap (2011) and teen adventure series Nowhere Boys (2013–18). Tony discusses the influence of pop culture, particularly comics.
